name: Boots of Elvenkind
effects: Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks relying on sound

name: Boots of Striding and Springing
effects: Walking speed becomes 30 feet if lower

name: Boots of Speed
effects: Opportunity attacks against you have disadvantage

name: Boots of the Winterlands
effects: Ignore difficult terrain from ice and snow

name: Boots of Levitation
effects: Can cast Levitate on yourself at will

name: Boots of Flying
effects: Gain a flying speed equal to walking speed

name: Boots of False Tracks
effects: Leave false tracks of another humanoid race
